#summary This guide tell you steps to get Facebook secrets..

=Facebook=

==Steps==

*1. Go to URL - [http://www.facebook.com/developers] and fill username and password. Create account if you don't have one.*

https://socialauth-android.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/facebook3.png


*2. c.	After creation of account , this page will open - [https://developers.facebook.com/apps]*


https://socialauth-android.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/facebookscreen1.png


*3. Create new App and Fill all details as shown below. Fill dummy url in site url field. 

https://socialauth-android.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/facebookscreen2.png

*4. Note down keys and secrets and copy them in oauth_consumers.properties file.
